name: Computer Janitor
description:
Did you try turning it off and back on again? Computer Janitor VR simulates the lowest of IT workers. Resolve those support tickets with a vengeance!

Right now it's just a one level demo, but this will be turning into a full-fledged game!

Requires Oculus Runtime 0.8, and a Leap Motion with the latest ORION software. There are also mouse and keyboard bits in the game as well.
